definitions.definition: Lacking strength; weak ; languid ; inclined to lose consciousness
examples: I felt faint after my fifth gin and tonic.

definitions.definition: Lacking courage, spirit, or energy; cowardly ; dejected
Barely perceptible ; not bright, or loud, or sharp
examples: There was a faint red light in the distance.

definitions.definition: Performed, done, or acted, weakly ; not exhibiting vigor, strength, or energy
Sickly , so as to make a person feel faint.

main_definition: ( of a being ) Lacking strength; weak ; languid ; inclined to lose consciousness
secondary_definitions: Lacking courage, spirit, or energy; cowardly ; dejected
Barely perceptible ; not bright, or loud, or sharp
Performed, done, or acted, weakly ; not exhibiting vigor, strength, or energy
( archaic ) Sickly , so as to make a person feel faint.
